saao/saa15/P334858
a-na LUGAL be-li₂-ia ARAD-ka {1}{d}UTU-EN-PAB lu-u DI-mu a-na LUGAL be-li₂-ia DI-mu a-na {URU}de-ri DI-mu a-na {URU}HAL.ṢU ina UGU {LU₂}x x x x-MEŠ a-ši-bi URU ša {URU}de-ri ša LUGAL be-li₂ iš-pur-an-ni ma-a 02 TA ŠA₃-bi-šu₂-nu lil-lik-u-ni ina pa-ni-ia le-ru-bu an-nu-rig {1}{d}PA-GAL₂-ši x x x x x ina pa-ni-ia it-tal-ku-u-ni an-ni-i šu-u x x x x x x x ina {URU}kal-ha LUGAL be-li₂ ṭe₃-e-mu is-sak-na-ni ma-a x x+x-LUGAL-a-te x x ina UGU-hi-ia x x x x x x x x+x x x x x x-bi x x x x x x x ERIM-MEŠ 10 TA ŠA₃-bi-šu₂-nu ina pa-ni-ia it-tal-ku-u-ni ma-a a-na LUGAL o x x x x x x x x an x x x-ka x x x x x x x x-lak mu-uk ki-i x x x x ina {URU}A-MEŠ-dur-na-ni mu-uk a-ta-a a-na DI-mu LUGAL la tal-li-ka mu-uk u₂-ma-a LUGAL ID₂ e-te-bir mu-uk šum-ma a-na DI-mu LUGAL tal-la-ka mu-uk LUGAL SAG-ku-nu im-at-tah e-mar-ku-nu ma-a x-MEŠ-ni kib-su an-ni-i ma-aʾ-du x x DUMU-KA₂.DINGIR-MEŠ i-da-tu-u₂-a i-da-tu-u₂-a i-du-lu TA pa-an ap-ta-lah₃ ad-du-ka-šu-nu u₂-ma-a an-nu-rig ina IGI LUGAL be-li₂-ia it-tal-ku-u-ni
